posts.title: Local hospital improves hygiene after citizen report
posts.summary: After Narayani Sena's alert, the municipal health team inspected a government hospital and implemented weekly cleaning drives.

posts.title: Citizens rally for safer pedestrian zones
posts.summary: Local residents submitted a petition to improve zebra crossings and install traffic lights after multiple accidents near schools.

posts.title: Public park revived through citizen initiative
posts.summary: Community members planted 50+ trees, fixed benches, and painted walls as part of the ‘Clean My City’ Narayani Sena program.

posts.title: Citizens expose illegal dumping near water bodies
posts.summary: Residents filmed and reported illegal dumping near Powai Lake, prompting BMC to issue fines to two private contractors.

posts.title: Narayani Sena helps identify fake job ads
posts.summary: Using the Sena’s citizen channel, young professionals verified job ads and flagged over 40 fraudulent postings.

posts.title: Rural health camp organized by local Sena volunteers
posts.summary: Volunteers hosted a medical camp serving 300 villagers with free check-ups and government health scheme guidance.
